package.description: Robotic perception algorithms for 2D images. They are intended to be flexible and tightly work together with following packages: cloud_tools (using table_memory functionality) cloud_algos (using IAS 3D perception algorithms) pcl stack (using general 3D perception algorithms and tools) knowledge stack (for reasoning and inferences) cognitive_perception (for some further CV algorithms).
package.author: Dejan Pangercic
